ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron kneels on the ground, gasping for air. She looked to the side and... yes! There it was!: I m full of surprises! Tavatron closed her hand around her

Tavatron kneels on the ground, gasping for air. She looked to the side 
and... yes! There it was!:

"I'm full of surprises!" Tavatron closed her hand around her drill sword and 
lifted it over her head. She brought it down across Dinobot's already 
damaged face.

Tavatron dropped to all fours, her wounds bled freely and her ribs ached, 
some of them were probably broken. She rubbed the back of her neck where 
Dinobot had grabbed her.

"Ohhhh," Tavatron blinked twice, she hadn't realized how slagged she 
actually was.

"Computer, begin internal repairs." Tavatron looked at Dinobot:

"I'm not a transmetal, my organic components can't take anymore of this." 
Tavatron tried to stand, but fell back to the ground, cluthing her side.

*Broken ribs, great.* Tavatron stays on the ground, catching her breath.

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Sun, 16 Apr 2000 15:28:25 PDT
>
>* Dinobot compleated the move by bringing his knee up and ramming it into
>Tavatron's ribes then grabbing the back of her head and reefing his hand
>backwards. He snarled as he slammed his tail into the back of her knees...
>He breathed hard but was alive with the action of the battle.
>                                               If Tavatron was a true enemy
>then we would finish the move and slash his claws across her throat, thus
>ending her life! But this was a practice battle, as intense as it was it 
>was
>still just a test of skill.
>Dinobot roared...*
>
>" You fight well, your skill surprises me."
>
>* Usually his enemies would either have been running or dead by the time of
>his second blow but he was shocked at how Tavatron had held on. There was
>much potential in her yet!*
>
